intro: This wikiHow teaches you how to set up and play Fortnite: Battle Royale on your computer, console, or mobile item, as well as how to stay alive while playing.

steps.title: Keep playing.
steps.subtitle: Like any other online shooter, Fortnite has a steep learning curve at first, and the only way to improve is by continuing to play.
sub-points: Once you've played a few games, you'll most likely have a handle on the basics of Fortnite, making it easier to secure a win.
